infos.info: Al Jolson appeared under many different titles - - Presenting Al Jolson 11/18/32-2/24/33 - The Kraft Music Hall 8/3/33-10/12/33, 2/22/34-4/26/34, 7/12/34-8/16/34, 10/2/47-5/26/49 - Shell Chateau 4/6/35-3/28/36 - Lifebuoy Program 12/22/36-12/12/39 - Rinso Program 12/22/36-12/12/39 - Tuesday Night Party 3/21/39-12/12/39
Dunning notes this was a continuation of The Lifebuoy Program after Al Jolson abruptly left.
